data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during AMAZONE cruise from Texel to Lissabon started at 1791-12-17
Ship: Amazone (Fregat), Voyage: Texel - Lissabon, 1st Observer: A. Kuvel (Kapitein), Company: ADM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
